title: Pixel 3a - How to Disable Fingerprint Unlock? (WITHOUT deleting prints)
content:
On the Pixel 3a (Android 11), how can I disable that touching the fingerprint sensor unlocks the phone?

I do not want to delete the registered fingerprints, as I still want to use the fingerprint sensor as biometric authentication with apps like PayPal.

I can't find any option for that.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
